column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I went inside the bathroom with my change of clothes and a towel .
#id=2
#text=I put in the bath plug and turned on the hot water faucet to start filling up the bathtub .
#id=3
#text=I waited a few minutes for the tub to fill up , and then added bath soap to the tub .
#id=4
#text=I undressed , and stepped into the bathtub which was filled with bubbles .
#id=5
#text=I laid down in the tub and relaxed for a few minutes and thought about my day .
#id=6
#text=Then , I used a loofah to scrub all over my body until I was clean .
#id=7
#text=I turned on the hot water again and filled up a cup with the hot water and poured it onto my hair .
#id=8
#text=I used one squirt of shampoo and rubbed it into my hair until I made suds .
#id=9
#text=Then I rinsed my hair out again with a cup of hot water .
#text=I removed the plug from the bottom of the tub and stood up while the water drained .
#text=I rinsed my body off with a few more cups of hot water until I was n't soapy anymore .
#text=Then I grabbed my towel off of a shelf next to the tub and used it to dry myself off .
#text=I stepped out of the tub onto the bath room carpet and changed into my clothes .
